item.title: How do i make specifac commands? eg ::master ::rares
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Search “yell” and where the command ends, at it under it.

So
under: the last } in the “yell” command.
